description: BTCPay Server is a free, open-source, self-hosted Bitcoin payment processor that enables merchants to accept Bitcoin payments without intermediaries.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_PAYMENT_REQUEST
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new payment request for a store. Use after confirming store ID.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_STORE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new store in BTCPay Server. Use when you need to provision a new store before processing transactions.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new BTCPay Server user. Use when you need to register a new user programmatically as an administrator.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to register a new webhook. Use when you need to receive store event notifications.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_DELETE_API_KEY
capabilities.description: Tool to revoke a specific API key. Use when you need to remove an API key to immediately prevent its use. Call after identifying the key to revoke.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_DELETE_PAYMENT_REQUEST
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific payment request. Use when you need to archive/remove an existing payment request for a store.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_DELETE_PAYOUT
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific payout from a store. Use when you need to cancel a payout no longer needed.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_API_KEY
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the current API key. Use after authentication to get API key details.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_API_KEYS
capabilities.description: Tool to list API keys. Use when you need to retrieve all API keys associated with the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_PAYMENT_REQUESTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all payment requests for a specific store. Use after confirming you have the store ID.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_SERVER_INFO
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve information about the BTCPay Server instance. Use when needing server version, tor address, supported payment methods, and synchronization states.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_STORE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific store. Use when you need full store configuration.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific user. Use when you need to fetch profile data for a given user ID or email.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific webhook. Use when you need to verify the configuration or status of a webhook for a given store after its creation.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_WEBHOOKS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all webhooks registered for a store. Use when you need to retrieve the configured webhooks for management or auditing.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_LIST_APPS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all apps associated with a specific store. Use when retrieving basic metadata of every app in that store.

capabilities.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_UPDATE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to update current user information. Use when you need to modify your authenticated user profile on BTCPay Server.
